column2: La Hermandad, or “The Brotherhood” is the name commonly used to refer to a group of militant Catholics of Hispanic heritage. Owing its origins to worker’s movements predating the Event, La Hermandad merges Catholicism with a reverence for saints of agriculture and labor, believing that kings should work the fields besides their subjects.
You may play with the fabric of time and launch a Consumerist Revolt somewhere in the world.

Long before the first spark It was said that all was a part of the grand accordance of the All-Go-Rhythm the song of the Universe composed by the Great Tek the law which binds all together. The Code for which is as old as it is arcane performed as a secret and sacred rite of ?transfer? (Divination). Men who have heard the All-Go-Rhythm Diviners known as Eye-Tee are said to cravenly hold the secrets of the song inside their giant temples called ?Mainframes? which house idols of ?dayta? said to be spirits in service to Tek.

Phantasmic is a faith based upon a reverence America and its foremost prophet, Walt. Through his parables and remarkable magical projections, Walt preached individualism, decency,  love for the fellow man, and a respect for family and nation.Walt eventually ascended to godhood himself but not before leaving behind the Park, heaven on earth, for his followers to care for. Since then, the Phantasmics have acted as the stewards for Walt’s legacy in the form of the Park, and they strive to keep his vision of America alive.
Joseph Bonesworth is Blacklisted from Freddy Fazbear's after attempting to marry Chica

n a chilling, enigmatic sequence, these fragmented verses weave a haunting narrative. An eerie atmosphere unfolds as the instructions demand attention and obedience, hinting at a world of concealed intentions and ominous implications. With phrases like "Welcome to the circus," "Power down, Are you feeling nervous?" and "We all scream for ice cream," a disconcerting sense of foreboding permeates the scene, hinting at a hidden agenda. The verses speak of manipulation, a plea to serve, and an unsettling shift in roles, wherein one takes the place of another, suggesting a mysterious and unsettling power play. The repeated motif of being 'below the surface' in a place 'built without purpose' implies a deeper, darker layer to this cryptic scenario. Themes of control, deception, and an ominous unknown presence pervade these enigmatic lines, leaving an unsettling impression on the reader.
The Era of Acquisitions has Begun\n

The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the adherents of '[New.Religion.GetHighGodName]' in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!\n\nThe word of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] must be brought to these socialist heathens!

The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the followers of [New.Religion.GetHighGodName] in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms against the uncivilized barbarians!\n\nThese silly symphonies will soon know the truth of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!

The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the [New.Religion.GetName] villians in [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms against the deniers of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!\n\nThey will render unto us what is ours, and then some!

Haymarket, a small town of great importance to the Phantasmic faithful is under the neglectful care of idiosyncratics. Long ago, the heirs to Walt attempted to conquer Haymarket but were repelled by natives. With the loss of Californian provinces the Chairman of the Mouse is calling for all Phantasmics to help in new Acquisitions for territory arou.
It's a small world after all,

Renaissancist is a faith that branched off of Phantasmic, claiming the eponymous Eisner as their prophet rather than Walt. The Renaissancists claim that Eisner brought about a Golden Age to America superior to even Walt’s efforts. Eisner’s parables are actually accepted generally by mainstream Phantasmics, but the primary difference between the two besides their choice of prophet is their method of expansion. Renaissancists prefer aggressive expansion and acquisition.versus the proselytization and preservation advocated by Phantasmics.

The vast wilderness of the west seems a land without law, without structure, without civilization. The Rangers of Muir, known to outsiders as the Foresters, revel in that freedom and recite the ancient creed of Conservation that John of the Mountains passed down to them. Nature must be respected and preserved. In their scattered camps and remote strongholds, they watched over the forests, plains, and mountains for the siren calls of the Dark Cicada, a being that brought the cataclysmic fires that consumed the old world. The world ended to it?s fiery grasp before, and the Foresters are determined not to allow it to happen once more. As the mantra of their bear-god Smokey claims, Only you can prevent wildfires.
House Tannerite descends from Tanner Tannerite I, the first Apostle of the Dominionist faith who gained glory and infamy for his many conquests.
was drowned in the black goo of the La Brea Tar Pits on the orders of $KILLER$
was drowned in the black goo of the La Brea Tar Pits
was killed by his troups on the Coloradan Frontier
was burnt upon a great pyre on the orders of $KILLER$
was heroically killed trying to defend his city during a siege lead by $KILLER$
was heroically killed trying to defend his city during a siege
the Pale Death of the Joshuans

Micah the Pale Rider took the city of Denver after killing Pike Nilsen in single combat. For three terrible days he held Denver before eventually being pushed out by Rockhart Nilsen. Afterwards he carved out a formidible Trailwalker realm out of the ruins of the Kingdom of Colorado.
Atom-Blessed blood of César Silverplate Cibolero, the Warhead That Never Was, Scourge of the Californian Bear, and Neomexicano liberator, warlord, and arms dealer.
Saintly Blood of Joseph the Shepherd
This is the blood of Saint Joseph the Shepherd, who successfully defeated the Mad Dragon Cuahtémoc Boreal and united the different fiefdoms of the Valley.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstName] dedicated [This.Founder.GetHerHis] life to fishing for men's souls in honor of [This.Founder.GetHerHis] God's capricious covenant.

Although begrudgingly permitted, Polygamy is not smiled upon in the Kinemite philosophy. The faithful will turn their noses at such an act, but as ruler, your word is law...
Although begrudgingly permitted, Polygamy is not smiled upon in the Edenite philosophy. The faithful will turn their noses at such an act, but as ruler, your word is law...

After reascendance of the Princedom of the Mojave, the people of [Root.GetName] began to reincorporate more and more of the traditions of the High Desert into their culture, to a point where they may now be considered true masters of the Mojave Desert. They have begun to refer to themselves as Joshuans once agian.
What will they think of next, I wonder?
Welcome into the fold, my Joshuan brothers and sisters!
The fabled crown of Tanner Tannerite, the First Apostle. It is crafted from ammunition welded together and is traditionally worn by all the Apostles of the Dominionate.
Reform the Princedom of the Mojave
During Joseph Gonzalez’s war against Socal, he set up his right-hand man Constantius Phillipus as the Sovereign of the Mojave. A sufficiently powerful Christian lord could reclaim the title.
Reprivatizing this land will result in buildings being destroyed! Those currently living in those lands will not be happy.
Return the land to its natural state.
The sovereign land has recently been returned to its natural state. The evicted inhabitants are arming themselves, hell-bent on reversing this decision.

Groups of rangers are returning the land of this county to a state of nature. If this county is conquered by a character who is not from the Range or the Reserve, the rangers will cease their activities.
This county has been returned to nature recently by ranger. For as long as this modifier remains, the county cannot be plundered or raided.
Preservation by nobles has left this land in a depopulated state.
The Rangers of this county have newly consecrated it after returning it to nature.
The transition from settled land to preserve was not easy on the people of this county.
You can choose to stop the preservation of this Holding.\n\nYou will not be able to resume preservation for one year
Your nobles have reprivatized [target_location.GetName] and a holding in the county has been completely transformed into farmland.
We will use fresh manure to fertilize the fields!
The transition into unsettled farmland has not being comfortable for the peasantry.
We shall feast and sacrifice whoever is left in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
Your nobles have reprivatized [target_location.GetName] and a holding in the county has been completely transformed into farmland.
Embrace one of La Hermandad's Schools of Thought

La Hermandad is a diverse movement encompassing a wide array of philosophies within the Catholic tradition of labor. Any adherent of La Hermandad of substantial standing within the movement may choose to follow one of these philosophies for themselves.

Weathering the great storm of heathens that had once threatened to overrun the peninsula, the resurgent High Priest of the Navegantes, known throughout the faithful for his campaigns of cleansing many heathens in the baptism of the Living Water, emerged from the waves and called for the Navegants to rebuild their priesthood. The Fisher of Men reminded them of the story of Christ calming the storm, and how he too had brought peace through his faith and devotion to Yahvé. Under the guidance of the Fisher of Men, the Navegantes reformed their priesthood and found a new sense of purpose in their daily work. His teachings of patience, bravery, and sharing the gifts of the Sea were highly regarded, and the Navegantes looked to him as an example of true devotion.
Even the winds and the waves obey him!
On that day living water will flow out from Jerusalem.
Was slain by $KILLER$ in the great Battle of Ojinaga
Died in the great Battle of Ojinaga

§Monumento a la Patria§!\n§YMonument to Fatherland§!\\nLocated in the heart of Mérida, the Monument to the Fatherland tells the story of a proud nation in the carving of a single colossal boulder. This imposiong strucutre serves as a perennial reminder that Mérida once was a proud provincial capital of an ancient state..
